b2-rocket-troopers.author: Fantasy Flight Games
b2-rocket-troopers.name: B2 Rocket Troopers
b2-rocket-troopers.ability: While performing a non-:salvo: attack against a ship at close-medium range, you may exhaust this card. If you do, the defender gains 1 raid token of your choice. While attacking a squadron, you may exhaust this card. If you do, add 1 die of a color already in your attack pool to your attack pool.
